name: The Path To Die
description: Travel to Feudal Japan and use your right stick as your katana to slay your enemies in this action and adventure game represented in pixel art and top down view.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E6750 / AMD Athlon 64 X2 Dual Core 5000+ or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GT 430 (1024 MB) / Radeon HD 5570 (1024 MB) DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 5 GB available space
